title: Tylopilus brachypus
text: Tylopilus brachypus is a <a href="bolete">bolete</a> fungus in the family <a href="Boletaceae">Boletaceae</a> found in <a href="Durango">Durango</a>, Mexico, where it grows under <a href="pine">pine</a> and <a href="oak">oak</a> in <a href="montane">montane</a> forests. It was described as new to science in 1991.
